thread.section_title: La Maison Favart - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of La Maison Favart, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Susan W
title: Great location
text:
This is a lovely hotel with very helpful staff and with a great location. Walkable to the louvre, galleries lafeyette ,the seine and the metro.
Near some great little untouristy restaurants and quieter than some areas. The rooms are very good and there are little extras such as an honesty bar and a small well being area/pool/sauna so take your costume unlike us . !
The breakfast is fantastic and meant we didn't need to eat until the evening .
We shall come back ...
